Text: I'm in Draper City unveiling my legislation to establish a wildfire commission which would conduct a national review of wildfire policy and make recommendations to Congress. Tune in: https://t.co/xKBXuvax7K

Each year, I have the honor of nominating some of Utah’s best and brightest students to our nation’s various service academies. This morning, I was able to meet with some of these students and wish them well before they head off to serve. I know they’ll represent our state well! https://t.co/bZbbDzXmW8

Utah’s once thriving arts and entertainment venues, already devastated by the pandemic, are going out of business while waiting for grant funding. @SBAgov must disburse its grant funding to struggling live entertainment venues without delay. https://t.co/iSVtNdlRYq

China is using its vaccines to expand its geopolitical power, and as an opportunity to spread propaganda that the US is not an ally of Taiwan. The US must continue to make delivery of safe and effective COVID vaccines to Taiwan, and other countries in need, an urgent priority. https://t.co/0J6K9xbhE5

The U.S. must be extraordinarily explicit—in partnership with our allies and free nations around the world—of the economic consequence that would ensue should the Chinese Communist Party continue down its current path with Taiwan, human rights, and predatory economic behavior. https://t.co/2FI9G1hZLT

The Chinese Communist Party is attempting to cut off Taiwan from global association and choke its economy—threatening invasion with military incursions and incendiary language. Just look at Hong Kong! The US must partner with allies to ensure Taiwan isn’t isolated from the world. https://t.co/Nv3ySNKfOZ

The U.S. believes that the people of Taiwan should be allowed to determine their own destiny.
 
The Chinese Communist Party believes that it is free to usurp the will of the people of Taiwan.
 
We must support Taiwan's autonomy. https://t.co/MqWKtXsIE3

Taiwan is an important ally and plays a significant role in countering China’s aggression in the region. Live soon→ @SenMarkey and I are hosting a @SenateForeign hearing to discuss ways in which the U.S. can strengthen its relationship with Taiwan: https://t.co/k2VA3THY3p

Traffic congestion has become an issue in Utah and in places all across the country. Thrilled that @SenateCommerce adopted my language in their surface transportation bill to reduce congestion and improve the safety and effectiveness of our roads. https://t.co/3aG5egoma6

Several wilderness-designated areas along Utah's Bonneville Shoreline Trail are hampering its full use for recreation. I urged my @EnergyGOP & @EnergyDems colleagues to consider legislation to adjust the trail's boundaries to ensure that construction can be fully completed. https://t.co/PIZLypp8bX

Met with @SaltLakeCC President Huftalin to discuss the needs of community college students in Utah and across the country. I also congratulated her on the Men’s Soccer Team’s big win of the @NJCAA National Championship last week! https://t.co/XbPMLAcLCR

During wildfires, the heroic actions of Utah’s firefighters and first responders are on full display. Thank you for all your efforts to protect our communities. Praying for your continued safety. https://t.co/Dl5KfKq3yM
246 years strong. Happy birthday @USArmy! https://t.co/TxUkpDOjYS

China has largely been able to hide the genocide of the Uyghur people from the world at large. This is unacceptable. Free countries around the world must speak out against the Chinese Communist Party's grave human rights abuses—it's the only way to stop the genocide. https://t.co/MVCtXVuaHo

Call this what it is: Russia is giving a state sponsor of terrorism an advanced tech platform that it will use to bring more destabilization to the Middle East. The President must give a clear-eyed rebuke of Russia’s behavior when he meets with Putin. https://t.co/gG241lFPAQ

The Chinese Communist Party is successfully orchestrating the deportation of Uyghurs—and not just political activists—from other countries to conceal their human rights abuses. The lengths at which the CCP will go to keep the Uyghur genocide under wraps should alarm the world. https://t.co/FENHO6dI3A

What the Chinese Communist Party is perpetrating on the Uyghur people is atrocity not seen or imagined coming from a nation in our era—concentration camps, forced labor, Uyghur women being raped by Han Chinese men. The world must not turn a blind eye to these horrific actions. https://t.co/JPQZosNIi9

The Administration's announcement of donating 500 million COVID vaccines to countries in desperate need is exactly the role the U.S. should be playing in this global pandemic. I spoke with @StateDept this morning, and they understand the urgency of the global vaccination effort.

Before making a final decision on the Bears Ears and Grand Staircase-Escalante national monuments, we're asking the President to meet with us and to share @Interior @SecDebHaaland's report. We remain committed to finding a permanent, legislative solution. https://t.co/u0aYnRK1Um

Traffic congestion has become an issue in Utah's cities and in many of our country's metropolitan areas. Our Smart Intersections Act would reduce congestion & improve the safety & effectiveness of our roads, while also reducing fuel costs & air pollution. https://t.co/mHduOfkqGp

The U.S. partnership with Taiwan continues to grow despite the Chinese Communist Party's efforts to isolate Taiwan from the world. @SenMarkey and I will hold a @SenateForeign subcommittee hearing next week to explore ways to grow this critical partnership. https://t.co/1EpwYCQnmu
COVID-19 vaccines are safe and effective—and importantly, free! Utahns can find vaccine information here: https://t.co/LXepyYoutE. Find a vaccination site near you: https://t.co/lvnHXtGB5l

Whether committing genocide or stealing intellectual property, the Chinese Communist Party will go to great lengths to make China the world’s dominant player. The China package passed today included eight of my amendments aimed at countering this threat. https://t.co/86Be5CCp2r

A country that commits genocide against its people does not deserve an Olympic showcase. The Senate today voted for a US diplomatic boycott of the Beijing Olympics. This solution repudiates China’s ongoing human rights abuses in a way that is not detrimental to American athletes.

Some policies that can realistically stem the illegal immigration crisis:

- Completion of the barrier at our southern border
- Enact mandatory E-Verify
- Require asylum seekers to apply in their home country or the nearest safe location

The VP’s campaign to address the “root causes” of illegal immigration won’t solve our current crisis. We can’t eradicate poverty and crime here at home, let alone across all of Latin America. Our free enterprise system will always lure people in search of better opportunities.

It is unacceptable that an American company may have extended the Chinese Communist Party’s censorship to the U.S. @Microsoft must explain whether the censorship of images associated with the anniversary of the Tiananmen Square Massacre were intentional. https://t.co/4T6HZdT5SV

Glad @FEMA has approved the state’s request for assistance in Garfield County. We must ramp up coordination with state & local leaders on wildfire mitigation and prevention efforts. Praying for the safety of the firefighters who are working to get the #MammothFire under control. https://t.co/2ZrS4GqIEh

It has been 77 years since Allied Forces stormed the beaches of Normandy on D-Day—taking incredible risks to safeguard freedom and liberate an entire continent. We will never forget the sacrifices of the Greatest Generation 🇺🇸 https://t.co/lw0HEwGlwF

More than 30 years after the Tiananmen Square massacre, the Chinese Communist Party continues to imprison or execute dissidents in its quest to quash any semblance of freedom. We must continue to condemn the repression of human rights in China & Hong Kong. https://t.co/8gVXhQR9zk

This is a good first step. I continue to urge the Administration to ramp up its global vaccine distribution with a plan that considers urgent need and regional priorities, and I look forward to the next batch being allocated quickly. https://t.co/WKOihrMgTG

Countries like Taiwan & India are in desperate need of #COVID19 vaccines, so I’m pleased that the Administration is moving into the implementation stage of its global vaccine distribution plan. US vaccines are far safer and more effective than those coming out of China or Russia.

It’s been nearly 80 years since Theodore Jensen went missing following the attack on Pearl Harbor and now his remains are finally home. The prayers of Theo’s family have been answered. https://t.co/RHnUIXbevq

Today, we remember the two Utahns we lost this past year in service to our nation—@USAirForce 1st Lieutenant Kenneth “Kage” Allen and @USArmy Sergeant Bryan Mount. We will never forget the sacrifice of these fine men, and all of those who serve our country with such great honor. https://t.co/WNUDLOr6u5

Our fallen heroes shouldn’t exist in history as merely a name and rank on a memorial marker. Grateful that initiatives like Utah’s “Stories Behind the Stars” make sure that the servicemen who never returned are remembered, and that their stories endure. https://t.co/nRJCf9oCYa

The cause of freedom comes at a dear cost. On #MemorialDay, we honor the brave men and women who have given their lives in service to our country—protecting the freedoms we hold most dear and securing those very freedoms for others 🇺🇸 https://t.co/0dTlOtHYAL

My Family Security Act would give greater financial security to American families by streamlining existing federal benefits into direct cash payments to parents. Tune in for my conversation with @DeseretNews and @FamStudies on family policy, live now: https://t.co/JedTRFQKnp

The U.S. is in urgent need of a comprehensive strategy to counter the China threat. My amendments to the China package require the President to develop a grand China strategy, drill down on CCP propaganda efforts, support Taiwan's independence, and more: https://t.co/FzSmPdIsdE

The Social Security and Medicare trusts funds will be depleted within the next 11 years. Our bipartisan TRUST Act is designed to rescue these federal trusts funds from impending insolvency because simply ignoring this looming crisis is irresponsible. https://t.co/WwMsmsmn67

Alexander Lukashenko has taken to calling in a fake bomb threat to force land a civilian aircraft to silence an activist. The lengths to which a brutal dictator will go to quash dissent never ceases to amaze. Roman Protasevič must be released immediately. https://t.co/VwHLyi0230

We must do more to provide access to treatment for those who want to escape opioid abuse and addiction. My bill with @Sen_JoeManchin would help fund treatment facilities around the country, bolstering Utah's efforts to combat the opioid epidemic. https://t.co/B5hIinZxcl

China is using its far less effective COVID vaccine to push countries in desperate need of vaccines to follow China’s political goals. The U.S. must urgently move beyond the planning stage to the implementation stage of global vaccine distribution. https://t.co/WKOihrMgTG

The Democrats’ witness seems to believe children raised by a stay-at-home parent, like I was, are disadvantaged. It’s no coincidence that the Administration wants to spend $500 billion on government-approved daycare. Washington shouldn’t tell parents how to raise their kids. https://t.co/FVdfqxuw7g

Congratulations @UtahJazz on finishing the season as the best team in the League. There’s nothing like playing at home in front of the most spirited fans in the country. Everyone should #TakeNote Let’s bring it home! https://t.co/lIFkrfGTeT

By extending his hand of fellowship to a Rabbi and synagogue, our first president marked the way to be taken by all Americans. Those who commit acts of vandalism against Jews or their places of worship in Salt Lake City or anywhere else only disgrace their own souls. https://t.co/8IJyCzPXKR

Families are having fewer kids, partly because raising kids is expensive. My Family Security Act would give American families a healthier financial starting point through a monthly cash benefit, and eliminate penalties for marriage & stay-at-home parents. https://t.co/hqYjJeAEf0

The brave men & women of the @CapitolPolice work tirelessly to keep the Capitol and the lives of those inside of it safe. This week, we honor those we tragically lost this year—Officers Sicknick, Liebengood, and Evans. We'll never forget the service & sacrifice of these fine men. https://t.co/jLMZkmuiql

The U.S. continues to nod and look the other way on China’s assent and horrific practices. The Administration's response to this existential threat: free pre-K and community college. We must partner with our allies to divert China from its malevolent path. https://t.co/m5A1qZvMz7

We’re at risk of consequences both dire and preventable, due to:
 
1. China's quest to become the world's superpower
2. Climate change
3. Crippling national debt
 
The U.S. must not continue to ignore or minimize warnings on these critical issues. https://t.co/m5A1qZvMz7

Iran—the world’s leading state sponsor of terrorism—has been supplying Hamas terrorists with the thousands of missiles that are currently being fired at Israel. The Administration must keep sanctions against Iran in place that cut off that support.

Requiring employers to use the E-Verify system to ensure the legal status of employees will help address a driver of illegal immigration. For someone who claims to support the E-Verify system, it's puzzling that @SecMayorkas has no opinion on whether it should be mandatory. https://t.co/QK7i3gsUXr

We must rethink our immigration system to address the root causes of illegal immigration. Cartels are taking advantage of the current crisis and outdated laws. This must be dealt with in an urgent and aggressive manner, including completing construction of physical barriers. https://t.co/0RbAijXUUS
The person in charge of securing our border—@SecMayorkas—doesn’t believe that we have a crisis at our border. That is extraordinary and frankly, quite damning. https://t.co/xHh85OUarZ

Utahns don't need Senators from the East telling us what to do with our land. Since wilderness is so important to the Senator from Illinois, our bill designates 289,000 acres of national forest in Illinois as wilderness so he can enjoy it in his backyard. https://t.co/dQoTyZbYna

Paying people more money not to work disincentivizes work, plain and simple. Increased unemployment benefits are leaving employers struggling to staff up. I applaud @GovCox for this decision—it’s time we reopen our economy. https://t.co/9FquRBMsJ3

In a blatant race for geopolitical advantage, China and Russia are outpacing the US on delivering COVID-19 vaccines & PPE to countries across the world—but US vaccines are safer & more effective. The Administration should hit the gas on distributing vaccines to countries in need. https://t.co/HaWTWtxdxF

Equating massive Hamas attacks on Israeli citizens to Israeli efforts to target Hamas militants (with prior civilian warning) is reckless and irresponsible. There must be an immediate de-escalation of violence.

Inspectors general root out waste, fraud, and abuse in federal programs. The lack of Senate-confirmed IGs threatens the ability of these offices to conduct the oversight and investigations necessary to ensure proper use of taxpayer money. https://t.co/SC10j5yfWe

Each day, Utah's police officers put their lives on the line to protect our communities. During #NationalPoliceWeek, we recognize the service of these brave men & women & honor the life of Ogden Police Officer Nate Lyday, who we tragically lost in the line of duty this past year. https://t.co/GKYYw4Lsm1

An aging society has detrimental impacts for generations. The US birthrate is now at an all-time low. With a groundswell in Congress to update our family policies, we shouldn’t squander this opportunity for a temporary, partisan and expensive half-measure. https://t.co/hqYjJeAEf0
This is one more reason why borrowing and sending tens of billions to California was a crying shame—and why every Republican in Congress opposed it. https://t.co/Tzoo3WXejW

There’s a groundswell in Congress, and across the political spectrum, to update policies to meet the needs of families. We must work in a bipartisan manner to update policies to help American families, while not penalizing marriage or stay-at-home parents. https://t.co/63PfuBuVQW

Data and information provided by @KemGardnerInst on topics like diversity can help guide informed decisions on issues impacting Utah. Well-informed research has the ability to create opportunities for advancement within our communities. https://t.co/YN4HHT7j7J

Example: If you own a company that has a $100 profit & the corporate tax is 20%, the tax is $20. If it gives you a dividend for the $80 remaining & the individual income tax rate is 40%, you pay $32 income tax. The company’s profit yielded $52 in taxes to government: 52% not 20%.

POTUS’ claim that “corporations aren’t paying their fair share” is beneath him. If a company earns a profit, it only goes 3 places: taxes, growing the company, &/or shareholders. $ to shareholders is ALSO taxed, taxing the profit TWICE. The “share” going to taxes includes both. https://t.co/D9NCC8JW0Z

The US must get its fiscal house in order. We can’t just keep adding onto the national debt—we’re paying $500 billion/year in interest alone! My TRUST Act creates a process to rescue federal trust funds from looming insolvency, expedited by the pandemic. https://t.co/vpauIJhYgP
Today, the First Lady will make her first official visit to Utah. @FLOTUS—I hope you enjoy the beauty of our state and experience Utahns’ generosity and warmth. Welcome to the Beehive State!

Our country's declining population is a big problem. The U.S. birthrate is at an all-time low and in 2020, 25 states had more deaths than births. Congress must consider legislation like my Family Security Act—a monthly cash benefit to support families. https://t.co/3Bvc9x5IJJ

Our kids must have the tools to succeed in the 21st century global economy. By strengthening computer science curriculums in Utah and around the country, we can create more opportunities for students to gain the skills which our changing workforce demands. https://t.co/8PraMmgqR3

The Great Salt Lake is one of the largest saline lakes in the world & a cherished part of Utah. An ongoing monitoring system would inform coordinated management actions for threatened Great Basin saline lake ecosystems & the communities who depend on them. https://t.co/o0aNeGy5r9

We must not let China become the world’s economic, military, and geopolitical superpower. Discussing the need for a comprehensive strategy to combat the rising China threat against the U.S. and our allies with @USUAggies. https://t.co/fyxCPvGtRW

Spent the morning touring @ASIRobots in Mendon, learning about their work creating robotic technologies and speaking with employees. Innovation is the key to tackling climate change globally and keeping the U.S. economically competitive with countries like China. https://t.co/BUDxmXtw3L
Congratulations, Zach! Best of luck in New York. #GoCougs https://t.co/f8bS8jbTk5

The President says he wants unity, but it's impossible to unify America if you're only appealing to the liberal wing of your own party. Let's get back to the job of bipartisan governing—we are ready to work with him. https://t.co/c93jkbwVNT

In his first 100 days, the President has proposed $6 trillion in new spending—about 4x our total federal budget! That amount of spending jeopardizes our kids' future and saddles them with decades of interest costs. https://t.co/Ta5OYgUKfi

We can't sit by and allow China excess influence on global organizations—Taiwan must participate in the annual World Health Assembly. Excluding Taiwan would play right into the hands of the CCP in its quest to strategically isolate Taiwan from the global community. #LetTaiwanHelp https://t.co/BHqziIjuXc

Under the Chinese Communist Party’s rule, China has ambitions of becoming the global superpower. The U.S. must increase its investment in scientific and technological innovation to bolster our national security and remain competitive on the world stage. https://t.co/BEXb8ple4g

The beauty of Utah’s national parks is unrivaled. Ann and I have a tradition of taking our grandkids on a tour of our state's national parks every couple of years. During #NationalParkWeek, we celebrate the Mighty 5. If you're able, get out and #FindYourPark this week! https://t.co/ylZqcLagU6

Despite the fact that nearly two-thirds of Utah is public land, we are being drastically short-changed on funding for public lands maintenance projects—and @Interior should explain why. https://t.co/mBGPg8JnAJ

The infrastructure proposal led by @SenCapito is wisely focused on actual infrastructure and addresses real deficiencies. It’s a responsible, solid step forward, and the Administration should welcome efforts to find common ground and meet us at the negotiating table.

The Administration wants yet another multi-trillion dollar jobs/stimulus bill, this time under the guise of infrastructure. It is Covid, not inadequate stimulus, that slows hiring; infrastructure funding should be strictly targeted to actual infrastructure needs.

The Administration, together with our allies, must develop & coordinate significant consequences for China should the CCP use force against Taiwan. More information about my amendments that were included in today’s bipartisan @SenateForeign China package: https://t.co/JeGCY2v4d1

.@SenateForeign passed a China bill today that includes our amendment mandating a diplomatic boycott of the Beijing Olympics. China should not be rewarded with hosting the Games while the CCP commits genocide against Uyghurs. https://t.co/JeGCY2v4d1

The U.S. must have a comprehensive, effective strategy to stop China’s march toward global hegemony, autocracy, and repression. We must act now, with our allies, to change the trajectory China’s on and assure America’s leadership in the world. https://t.co/w6WuOJWDfL

It is outrageous that China gets to host the @Olympics while the Chinese Communist Party commits genocide against Uyghurs. At the same time, it's unfair to ask American athletes to surrender their dream. @TimKaine and I are calling for a diplomatic boycott of the Beijing Games. https://t.co/J0YEUJuuVh

Following today’s frank and candid briefing with Administration officials on Afghanistan, I am convinced that a withdrawal of U.S. troops is an error that will have serious consequences for our national security interests. https://t.co/kXtB8feBbT

Earmarks are rife with waste and abuse, and they open the door to excessive spending on unnecessary government projects. I’m proud to join my colleagues in this effort to preserve the ban on earmarks. https://t.co/o3aIwhNZUM

It's critical that students have the skills and training necessary to pursue good-paying jobs that keep up with our changing economy. My bill with @SenatorSinema would create a college matched-savings program to help students save for higher education. https://t.co/qQGUUb98LS
Thank you to the @MaloufFdn for bringing attention to this important issue. https://t.co/r6a3Kqkac5

More than 6,200 acres in Utah have been charred by wildfires this year. After seeing the bureaucratic hurdles Utah and Duchesne counties faced recovering from the 2018 wildfires, @RepJohnCurtis and I saw a need to help streamline the mitigation process. https://t.co/xfqMWyIKG9

Getting through the pandemic has required us to borrow trillions of dollars, threatening essential programs like Medicare and Social Security. Our bipartisan TRUST Act would shore up our fiscal footing by rescuing our federal trust funds from insolvency. https://t.co/mEEchvLHW2

So far this year, 126 wildfires have burned more than 6,200 acres of land in Utah. Our bill would help local communities cut through red tape in the wildfire recovery process—expediting cleanup, saving taxpayers money, and preventing further disasters. https://t.co/lOYVbDRipF

Ground has been broken on the Weber State University Bus Rapid Transit Project—a project decades in the making. This all-electric, rapid bus service is eco-friendly and will become a critical component of the transportation infrastructure of Ogden City. https://t.co/y84pFtV3Zf

Officer Billy Evans died a hero, protecting our nation’s Capitol—the home of our democracy. Keeping his children, Abigail and Logan, his loved ones, and his fellow USCP officers in my prayers. Rest in peace, Officer Evans. We will never forget your sacrifice. https://t.co/k1k9J1cWl6
Ann’s and my hearts are heavy with reports of two Salt Lake County deputies shot and hospitalized. We join them and their families in prayer and hope.

The Administration must work with us to craft a collaborative, consensus legislative solution for Utah's Bears Ears and Grand Staircase-Escalante monuments that reflects the input of the people most directly impacted and ends the political back-and-forth. https://t.co/RPJjHjxgRh

Decisions regarding the boundaries & management of Utah’s national monuments must be made collaboratively with state, local & tribal leaders—not through unilateral executive action. Spent the day visiting Bears Ears with @SecDebHaaland, @GovCox, @LGHendersonUtah & @RepBlakeMoore. https://t.co/OdTX2RviHx

Utah’s Bears Ears & Grand Staircase-Escalante national monuments need a permanent legislative solution to resolve the longstanding boundaries & management dispute. Appreciate @SecDebHaaland for traveling to Utah & meeting with us as part of the ongoing review of these monuments. https://t.co/zgUCcyehRh

Service to country is a value deeply engrained in Utahns. Members of the @UTNationalGuard are the true embodiment of that. Will be keeping these airmen in my prayers for a safe deployment. We’re proud of you and eternally grateful for your service.
https://t.co/0eDoQE5M2q

Brainwashing camps to strip Christians of their belief in God. Exacting genocide against Uyghurs and other ethnic minorities. Retaliation for independent thought. The lengths at which the Chinese Communist Party goes to wipe out anything it deems a threat should alarm the world. https://t.co/tyFUj5zM77
